Presentation.PageTitle: Use Profiles Data to Enhance Your Website

Param.Name: HTML
Param.p: We make much of the data in Profiles available for use in your apps and websites.

Data is available through a simple HTTP GET API, where you can get information about any user in the system in JSON format. You can integrate this with applications using your favorite language/environment, including JavaScript, Python, or Java.
All you need to know is the person's Profiles URL or campus identifier—or you can use a 2-step process to download data for every user in the system.
To learn more, contact us, and we can help get you set up.
